content: stitches from end p2tog turn work you will now have a gap on either side of your heel flap stitches and can easily see where to decrease row 3 slip first stitch k1 then work across the heel flap in a slip 1 k1 pattern until you come to the last stitch before the gap ssk turn work row 4 slip first stitch then purl across the row until the last stitch before the gap p2tog turn work row 5 slip first two stitches then work across the heel flap in a k1 slip 1 pattern until you come to the last stitch before the gap ssk turn work row 6 slip first stitch then purl across the row until the last stitch before the gap p2tog turn work repeat row 3 -6 until all of your gusset stitches are gone and you are left with 24 32 36 stitches remaining on the back sock cuff begin working in k1 p1 rib on the first round knit any 2 stitches together once to bring stitch count back to an even number work 4 rounds if you are not working the heel tab knit 2-6 more rounds and proceed to bind off heel tab work in rib across the front then on the back work in pattern until 2 stitches before the end of the round slip wrap and turn work in pattern until 2 stitches before the end of back stitches slip wrap and turn repeat these short row stopping 2 stitches before the last stitch wrapped 2 3 4 more times work around the entire sock cuff one more time picking up and working wrapped stitches as you come to them i-cord bind off see resources for an alternate bind off if preferred cast on 3 4 4 extra stitches *slip these stitches to the left needle knit 2 3 3 slip one stitch knitwise yo slip the next stitch knitwise then knit those three stitches together through the back loop repeat from * until all stitches are bound off cut the yarn leaving a tail and draw through the remaining i-cord stitches weave the end in adamantis heel cup using your knitting needle tip pick up 24 32 36 stitches in the row below your waste yarn and 24 32 36 stitches in the row above your waste yarn remove the waste yarn by cutting if you re brave or by pulling it out one stitch at a time if you prefer to be a bit more cautious worsted only start at round 6 round 1 knit around round 2 *knit 6 k2tog repeat
